Title: Our Son
Produced by:
Fernando Loureiro 
 Eric Binns 
 Guilherme Coelh 
 Jennifer 8. Lee 
 Christopher Lin
Production: In June 2022, it was reported that Billy Porter and Luke Evans joined the cast of the film, with Bill Oliver directing from a screenplay he wrote alongside Peter Nickowitz. In August 2022, Robin Weigert, Andrew Rannells, Isaac Cole Powell, Phylicia Rashad, and Kate Burton joined the cast of the film.
Release: Our Son had its world premiere at the 2023 Tribeca Festival on June 10, 2023. It will be released by Vertical Entertainment on December 8, 2023.
Reception: On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 86% of 22 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 6.4/10. Metacritic, which uses a weighted average, assigned the film a score of 58 out of 100, based on 6 critics, indicating "mixed or average" reviews.
